note.p: Gentleman farmer. Neighbour of CD. Resident at Baston House, Hayes, near Bromley, Kent, from between 1851 and 1855 until 1872.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/875/56/18)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 5 October 2018)
Post Office directory of the six home counties 1851–74.
